message: The TK table is missing data for the 3rd dose timepoint. Also check if there are any similar issues in other sections.

context.title: 28-Day Repeat Dose Toxicity Study in Rats

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: Following repeat intravenous administration of Test Article to male and female rats at 1, 5, and 25 mg/kg for 28 days, systemic exposure was evaluated on Day 1 and Day 28. Exposure increased in a dose-proportional manner. No notable sex differences were observed.

sections.title: Toxicokinetic Results
sections.content: Plasma concentrations of Test Article were measured following the 1st dose (Day 1) and last dose (Day 28). Mean Cmax and AUC0-24 values are presented in Table 1. Exposure on Day 28 was similar to Day 1, indicating no accumulation.

sections.title: Discussion
sections.content: Systemic exposure to Test Article increased with dose on both Day 1 and Day 28. The Rat showed similar exposure between males and females at all dose levels.

tables.caption: Table 1: Mean (CV%) Toxicokinetic Parameters Following IV Administration
